tool_description: Creates new support tickets with all required information and generates unique tracking numbers.

description.description: Detailed description of the customer's issue or request

contact_method.description: How customer contacted support (email, phone, chat, web_form)

error_messages: Missing required information: Provide customer_id, subject, description, and contact_method.
Invalid contact method: Use one of [email, phone, chat, web_form].
Subject too long: Subject must be 200 characters or less.
Description too short: Description must be at least 10 characters.
Customer ID not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide all required customer and issue information to create a new support ticket. The system will generate a unique ticket number and timestamp.

status.description: Initial ticket status (new, open, pending, resolved, closed)
